casebody.data:
The People ex rel. Leroy Macklin, Relator-Appellant, v. Richard Elrod, Sheriff of Cook County, Respondent-Appellee.(No. 58566;First District (1st Division)October 29, 1973.

EGAN, J., took no part.

James J. Doherty, Public Defender, of Chicago (J. Powers McGuire, Assistant Public Defender, of counsel), for appellant.Bernard Carey, State’s Attorney, of Chicago (Kenneth L. Gillis, Assistant State’s Attorney, of counsel), for the People. PER CURIAM.
